overview: The Bitchcraft series is where Jake Malone plays out his darkest, roughest lesbian scenarios. His latest all-girl power-exchange movie has an amazing array of beautiful, sick bitches from all over the porn universe. Lovely Chinese-American pervert Jandi Lin lords it over sexy dyke Roxy DeVille, who turns the tables and makes her tattooed tormentor submit. And tiny latina (and porn legend) Francesca Le messes around with bountifully-boobed blonde Carolyn Reese.
title: Bitchcraft 4
